# Dragon (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Add [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] to your list of cleric class skills. 

**Dragon Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Fang (Spell)|Magic Fang]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack rolls and damage rolls.

**2** **[[Resist Energy (Spell)|Resist Energy]]****:** Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

**3** **[[Magic Fang, Greater (Spell)|Magic Fang, Greater]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1/4 levels on attack rolls and damage rolls (max +5).

**4 [[Voice of the Wyrm (Spell)|Voice of the Wyrm]]:** +10 on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks; can use one *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*.

**5** **[[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Lets you see all things as they really are.

**6** **[[Stoneskin (Spell)|Stoneskin]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Ignore 10 points of damage per attack.

**7 [[Dragon Ally (Spell)|Dragon Ally]] <sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Dragon Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser dragon ally]]*, but up to 15 HD.

**8** **[[Suggestion, Mass (Spell)|Suggestion, Mass]]****:** As *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*, plus one subject/level.

**9** **[[Dominate Monster (Spell)|Dominate Monster]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but any creature.
